description.paragraph1: 24k Finance is a Real-World Asset (RWA) project focused on the tokenization of gold mining assets. Our primary offerings include:
description.paragraph2: • Tokenized Gold Mining Vault: Represented by African gold mines, offering over 30% potential returns through gold mining revenue rights.
description.paragraph3: • Tokenized Gold Tokens: Digital representations of physical gold.
description.paragraph4: • Mining-Focused Launchpad Platform: A platform to incubate and launch mining-related projects.
description.paragraph5: • Gold Spot and Futures Exchange: A trading platform for gold derivatives. Our core team brings over a decade of experience in the overseas mining industry, with expertise in gold mine development, geological exploration, and project management. By leveraging RWA tokenization, we aim to enhance the liquidity of gold mines, improve development efficiency, and lower investment barriers. We partner with professional institutions to custody user funds, increasing transparency and trust in the gold supply chain, thereby combining the traditional value of gold with the innovation of blockchain technology.
